hiveArticle.title: B&W Photo Contest - Macro - Entry #1 - Flower
hiveArticle.body:
This is my first entry for the B&W photo contest initiated by @daveks.

### Flower

I take all my photos by mobile. So while trying to get a macro shot, this is the farthest I have to keep to get a focus.

<hr>

  ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/vh4ut9l6b6.jpg)

<hr>

Camera : Nokia 6, Edited to Black and White

 <hr>
